original_text: And I heard what seemed to be a voice in the midst of the four living creatures, saying, “A quart of wheat for a denarius, and three quarts of barley for a denarius, and do not harm the oil and wine!”
korean_text: 내가 네 생물 사이로부터 나는 듯한 음성을 들으니 이르되 한 데나리온에 밀 한 되요 한 데나리온에 보리 석 되로다 또 감람유와 포도주는 해치지 말라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And I heard what seemed to be a voice
in the midst of the four living creatures,
saying, “A quart of wheat for a denarius,
and three quarts of barley for a denarius,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보리 세 되를 한 데나리온에요,

sentences.original_text: and do not harm the oil and wine!”
